attributes.action: end all mention of the Special Relationship with the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There never has been a Special Relationship between the UK and the USA that has been any more special than any other relationship on either side.  It therefore does not help the UK to continue referring to this non-existent Special Relationship, and I ask the PM to end all mention of it.
